homePageLoggedOut.description1: Your one-stop online booking platform. Discover, book, and manage all in one place. For both service providers and clients.
homePageLoggedOut.description2: Unique Features: Community-Driven Voting System for Desired Features and Tools, AI-powered Functionality.

homePageLoggedIn.greetingClient: Explore our new services and manage your bookings with ease!
homePageLoggedIn.greetingServiceProvider: Check your schedule and manage client appointments efficiently!
homePageLoggedIn.upcomingBookings: {{count}} upcoming bookings. What would you like to do today?

services.customerAttraction: Customer Attraction via Reviews and Social Media
services.advancedBookingManagementDescription: A sophisticated system that allows service providers to manage and optimize their bookings efficiently, enhancing customer attraction and streamlining operations.
services.transparentPricingDisplayDescription: Feature ensuring clear and upfront display of service prices, fostering trust and simplifying decision-making for clients.
services.qualityAssuranceStandardsDescription: A system to showcase cleanliness and professional qualifications of service providers, enhancing trust and quality perception among clients.
services.customerAttractionDescription: Tools for service providers to attract new customers through client reviews, ratings, and social media sharing capabilities.
services.communityDrivenFeatureDescription: A platform feature allowing users to suggest, vote on, and track new features, fostering a strong, engaged community.
services.personalizedClientExperienceDescription: A recommendation engine and customizable filters for clients to find services that match their specific needs and preferences.
services.userFriendlyInterfaceDescription: An intuitive and easy-to-navigate booking interface, enhancing the user experience for both service providers and clients.
services.analyticsDashboardDescription: Provides insightful analytics and data on booking trends, customer feedback, and service popularity to help service providers make informed decisions.

consentModal.agreeToPolicy: I agree to the data usage policy.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to Telobook! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information to provide better services to all our users. The information Telobook collects, and how that information is used, depends on how you use our services and how you manage your privacy controls.
section1.subsectionAContent: You may be asked to provide personal information anytime you are in contact with Telobook. Telobook and its affiliates may share this personal information with each other and use it consistent with this Privacy Policy. Here are some examples of the personal information we collect:

list.contactInfo: Contact Information: Includes your name, address, phone number, and email.
list.paymentData: Payment Data: Includes necessary data to process payments and prevent fraud (Note: all payment data is stored securely by our payment processors).
list.healthData: Health Data: If applicable, to provide health-related services.
list.technicalDetails: Technical Details: Includes your IP address, browser type, and operating system.
list.usageData: Usage Data: Includes URLs, timezone settings, and how you use our services.

section1.subsectionBContent: When you visit our website or use our services, we may automatically collect information about your device and usage of our services. This includes:

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

list.provideServices: Provide, operate, and maintain our services
list.improveServices: Improve, personalize, and expand our services
list.understandUsage: Understand and analyze how you use our services
list.developNew: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality

section3.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
section3.content: We may share the information we collect in various ways, including the following:

list.vendors: Vendors and Service Providers: We may share information with third-party vendors and service providers that provide services on our behalf.
list.thirdParties: Third-Party Partners: We may share your information with our third-party partners in order to receive additional legally permissible data about you.
list.businessTransfers: Business Transfers: Information may be disclosed to other trusted third-party companies in the case of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale.
list.lawEnforcement: As Required by Law: We may share information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant, or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Services
section4.content: Our services may contain links to third-party websites and services. We are not responsible for the practices employed by websites or services linked to or from our Service, including the information or content contained therein.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section5.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our service and hold certain information, such as session data. We use this data to enhance the performance and functionality of our services.

section6.title: 6. Data Security
section6.content: We use appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access to or unauthorized alteration, disclosure, or destruction of data. These include internal reviews of our data collection, storage, and processing practices, and security measures.

section7.title: 7. Your Data Protection Rights Under GDPR
section7.content: Under this regulation, you have various rights:

list.access: The right to access, update or delete the information we have on you.

section7.note: Please note that we may ask you to verify your identity before responding to such requests.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.content: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 16.

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section9.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

section10.title: 10. Contact Us
section10.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at privacy@telobook.com.
section10.contentForAddress: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at privacy@telobook.com or by post to:
section10.address:
Telobook, Inc.
123 Telobook Street
City, State, Zip Code

landingPage.title: Telobook
landingPage.streamlineYourBusiness: Streamline your beauty business with Telobook's intuitive tools.
landingPage.whyChooseTelobookDescription: Telobook is designed specifically for beauty professionals. With rapid feature updates and immediate issue resolutions, we stay responsive to your needs. As a small company, we are agile and attuned to our users, ensuring that you have the best tool to succeed.
landingPage.userCentricDesign: User-Centric Design: We put the needs of beauty professionals first.
landingPage.continuousImprovement: Continuous Improvement: Regular updates and new features based on your feedback.
landingPage.transparency: Transparency: Open communication and clear policies.
